Function reference

Functions

R functions of the throne package

rnp_flights_data()
Read and process flights data
rnp_otms_data()
Read and process OTM data
gen_otm_splines()
Generate OTM splines
correct_flights_data()
Correct flights data
match_data()
Match flights to OTM data
predict_thermal_landscape()
Predict thermal landscape

Datasets

Datasets used in the throne package

Example datasets

Datasets used as part of the examples in the package and in the validation of method

flights_metadata
Metadata for example flights
flights_data
Example flights data
otms_metadata
Metadata for example OTMs
otms_data
Example OTMs data
otms_splines
Example OTM splines nested data
matches_5
A tibble indicating the OTM that best describe the dynamics of a given tile assuming a error_max = 5.

Case study datasets

Datasets used in the case study

Other datasets

Miscellaneous datasets used in the vignettes

correction_data
A tibble with a comparison between the surface temperatures recorded by flights on tiles where OTM were deployed and the operative temperatures recorded by OTMs during the exact same period the flights were taking place
matches_20
A tibble indicating the OTM that best describe the dynamics of a given tile assuming a error_max = 20. The purpose of the increased error is for visualization purposes (i.e., so no empty tiles appear in the plots presented in the documentation vignettes).
elevation
Elevation profile of the area where we conducted the project at a spatial resolution of ~ 1m^2
bad_read_otm
OTM raw data file read incorrectly
good_read_otm
OTM raw data file read correctly
